Name: Lighthouse Keeper
About the game: This dark act takes place from a single day of the Lighthouse Keeper. Listen to keeper carefully and help him to interrupt his twenty-years-old shift at the Lighthouse. The game itself is a small visual novel dipping gamer into psychological experiences of the Lighthouse Keeper. First of all, this is an artistic manipulation with word and form, only then - a game. Features: Short duration (10-15 minutes) Unique graphic style Voice acting Authentic audio solutions 2 alternative endings
